channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump to put additional 25% import taxes on India, bringing combined tariffs to 50%
item.description: Trump has signed an executive order to place an additional 25% tariff on India for its purchases of Russian oil.

item.title: Protections of the Voting Rights Act are under threat as the law marks its 60th anniversary
The Voting Rights Act is turning 60. Civil rights marchers recall a hard-won struggle
